The Bound Brother This is a graveyard - empty of any life. But spirits gather here, drawn by the flux between life and death. Your spell has drawn you and your bonded mount together by this crossroads of spirits. One of them will guide you to your bound animal brother. The rest, however, may have other intentions.
If you persist, you might awaken and confront spirits of terrible power. Should you continue?

0 1 You step forward, and a banshee form coalesces before you. You reach for your weapon, but it does not attack.
"I was like you, once. I used the arcane to empower my thirst for ordering the world. But there can be no lasting justice, as there can be no enduring power, or persisting life."
M_Banshee_Card_01.png Medallion_Frame_17.png
You may be correct, spirit, but I must strive on nontheless. 1
Impede me no further, and silence your words of despair! 1
G-g-ghosts are s-s-scary! (abandon quest) -1 1
1 2 "Very well. We shall see what fate you weave, before you join us in the beyond."
The banshee fades, but it speaks again:
"Some of the spirits here are connected to living creatures, not the dead - creatures that might be bound to you. But what kind of spirit are you, channeler, that you would bind yourself to another?"
M_Banshee_Card_01.png Medallion_Frame_17.png
